DescriptionOfIncident: Squid in Sunflower Oil products  - because they contain salt crystals.
RiskToConsumers: Salt crystals may cause injury and may , also, be mistaken as glass.

DescriptionOfIncident: Southern Fried  Chicken - because packs may contain small pieces of hard plastic
RiskToConsumers: Physical contamination - presence of small pieces of plastic.

DescriptionOfIncident: Various sandwiches - products produced in unhygienic conditions.
RiskToConsumers: Potentially unsafe due to risk from poor hygiene.

DescriptionOfIncident: Various brands of Chicken and Bacon Caesar Wraps -  because products may contain metal fragments.
RiskToConsumers: Physical contamination - presence of small metal fragments.

DescriptionOfIncident: Blue cheese - because Listeria monocytogenes found in product.
RiskToConsumers: Microbiological risk - potential presence of harmful bacteria.

DescriptionOfIncident: 4 pack British Beef Quarter Pounders (Frozen) due to a possible link to illness with E. coli O157.
RiskToConsumers: Microbiological risk - potential presence of harmful bacteria.
